about_the_game:
Tower Invaders is an action game that combines the classic gameplay of Arcade machines with the most modern Roguelite.
In your ascent to the Tower you must survive hordes of enemies in each of its rooms, choosing between fighting, resting, shopping, looting or testing your luck.

The Magical wands

The most important element in Tower Invaders are the wands, each of the ten wands contains a different combination of the 5 magical energies: Fire, Electricity, Ice, Poison and Darkness.
Choose a wand for each “Run”, make the right choices to build the best possible “Build” and combine your magic with the powerful Relics you will find along the way.

The tower

Three levels separate you from the last challenge: The Dungeon, the Tower and the Laboratory.
Each level is guarded by a final boss and along the way you will have to face his henchmen and lieutenants.
Only by defeating the three Bosses will you be able to access the Final Enemy. Obtain the coveted Yew-Wand and the challenge has only just begun.
estrategia y conocimiento de los conjuros para superar todos los desafíos.

Not Just "roguelite"

Both the creation of maps and the combination of enemies and scenarios is done procedurally, making each game unique. But in addition, the scenarios will determine the progress according to the type of enemy, creating thousands of different possibilities.

A Real Challenge.

Tower Invaders is a challenge for the most demanding players, victory is not within the reach of everyone, a combination of skill, strategy and knowledge of spells is necessary to overcome all the challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Use the power of the wands and combine the 5 schools of magic and survive the enemy hordes! A roquelite with a different mechanic that will burst the buttons of your controller. Explore the Tower and get the coveted Yew Wand, the one that has all the powers.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Galician
